entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
